segments.text: Why aren't you doing your homework ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll do it later , Dad . I must prepare the concert on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , is it ? You'll be making records next , will you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd better get on with your homework ! You can practice on Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh dad . You don't understand at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I certainly could . You'll get exams next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't need it to play the guitar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don't you ? God save me !
segments.speaker: S1
